summary: This is a notice of docket activity from the Second Circuit Court of Appeals regarding case 20-2413, involving Ghislaine Maxwell. The court issued an order directing the United States to file a letter brief responding to the appellant's motion to consolidate, directing parties to respond, and adjourning the argument scheduled for September 22, 2020.

events.title: Court Order on Motion to Consolidate
events.description: The Second Circuit Court of Appeals issued an order directing the United States to file a letter brief responding to the appellant's motion to consolidate, directing parties to respond, and adjourning the argument scheduled for September 22, 2020.

events.title: Adjourned Court Argument
events.description: A court argument scheduled for this date in the Maxwell appellate case (20-2413) was adjourned until further order of the court.

keyFacts: The document is a notice of docket activity for appellate case 20-2413, involving Ghislaine Maxwell.
On September 11, 2020, the court issued an order directing the United States to respond to an appellant's motion to consolidate and adjourned the argument scheduled for September 22, 2020.
The notice was electronically mailed to a list of attorneys of record, indicating a large legal team representing Maxwell.
The document references a motion to consolidate, suggesting the coordination of multiple legal matters or appeals.
